SELECT A.AGGREGATION_UUID aggregationUuid, A.AGGREGATION_CODE aggregationCode, aggregation_con.CREATOR creator, authority.AUTHORITY_NAME authorityName, aggregation_con.CREATION_START_DATE creationStartDate, code_detail.CODE_NAME retentionPeriodName -- 보존기간 FROM RC_AGGREGATION A INNER JOIN RC_AGGREGATION_CON aggregation_con ON A.AGGREGATION_UUID = aggregation_con.AGGREGATION_UUID LEFT JOIN ( -- 각 어그리게이션 중 가장 최근에 insert 한 유저를 가져오기 위함. SELECT a.AGGREGATION_UUID, a.CREATOR_UUID FROM RC_AGGREGATION_CREATOR a INNER JOIN ( SELECT AGGREGATION_UUID, MAX(INSERT_DATE) max_insert_date FROM RC_AGGREGATION_CREATOR group by AGGREGATION_UUID ) grouped_creator ON a.AGGREGATION_UUID = grouped_creator.AGGREGATION_UUID AND a.INSERT_DATE = grouped_creator.max_insert_date ) creator ON creator.AGGREGATION_UUID = aggregation_con.AGGREGATION_UUID LEFT JOIN at_authority authority ON authority.AUTHORITY_UUID = creator.CREATOR_UUID
-- 보존기간이 없더라도 가져오기 위해서 LEFT JOIN. LEFT JOIN RS_RECORD_SCHEDULE schedule ON schedule.RECORD_SCHEDULE_UUID = aggregation_con.RECORD_SCHEDULE_UUID LEFT JOIN RS_GENERAL_RECORD_SCHEDULE general ON general.GENERAL_RECORD_SCHEDULE_UUID = schedule.GENERAL_RECORD_SCHEDULE_UUID LEFT JOIN AD_CODE_DETAIL code_detail ON code_detail.CODE_DETAIL_UUID = general.RETENTION_PERIOD_UUID WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.AGGREGATION_UUID = #{aggregationUuid}
